1.title: Welcome to Area 51
1.plot: Meet Chris 51 and his out-of-this-world team of tattoo artists at Area-51 Tattoo as they bring comics, cartoons and fantasy to life in eye popping ink. Get ready for the most hyper-real geek-chic tattoos imaginable: Chris-51 tattoos a rabid fan with Raphael from the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Heather crafts an epic portrait of Sloth and Chuck from the 1980's adventure, The Goonies and Chris Jones brands an Arnold Schwarzenegger devotee with the ultimate homage to Ah-nold.

2.title: Comedians, Zombies, and Space Cats, Oh My!
2.plot: The Area 51 crew bust out some more hyper-realistic tattoos including a portrait of the legendary Chris Farley, a pair of ram horns you've never seen on a man's head before, and an eye-popping zombie pinup girl. Meanwhile, Josh is tasked with tattooing a hyper-real image of a man's "space" cat onto his chest, while Caroline plays babysitter to his friendly feline.

3.title: The Duel and the Dark Knight
3.plot: In honor of Batman's 75th Anniversary, Chris Jones inks a huge fan with a hyper-real tribute to the Dark Knight. Then Chris 51 brings T-Rex out of extinction for a Jurassic Park fanatic. Meanwhile, Heather tattoos a squirmy girl's favorite video game into a beautifully designed half sleeve... in one day! And later on, Josh and Chris Jones team up to take a famous historical duel from the past and beam it into the future.

4.title: It's Chi-Town, Baby!
4.plot: Chris 51 and his band of needle nerds are headed to tattoo at one of the largest pop culture conventions in the country--Chicago's C2E2! Before heading out, Chris 51 has a client looking to tattoo a massive octopus wrapped around her upper body. And Heather and Caroline stay behind to work with a client who wants a unicorn in a very "hairy" spot. Meanwhile the rest of the crew plays hard, but works even harder in Chicago, when they take on a hyper-realistic Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle, a heavy metal inspired R2D2 and C3PO tattoo and a RoboCop portrait.

5.title: Friday the Thirteenth
5.plot: It's Friday the 13th and to celebrate Chris 51 and his crew are about to blow the roof off Area 51 with the biggest party of the year and a surprise celebrity guest. First, three female friends come to the shop and get epic horror and sci-fi themed tattoos. Chris Jones inks a hyper-real zombie from one of George Romero's classic horror films, Jeff engineers an impressive ray gun, and Josh goes to the dark side with a lifelike portrait of Elvira, "Mistress of Dark".

6.title: The Girl with the Monster Tattoo
6.plot: Chris Jones inks a hyper-realistic bloody mouth on a friend that blows everyone away. Heather has the ultimate mash-up tattoo on deck--a mix of a classic children's doll and the four horsemen of the apocalypse. Chris 51 and Jeff team up to do double space battle tattoos on two hot sisters. And Jeff honors a fellow tattoo artist by turning his hand into a real life machine while Josh creates the perfect mash-up of one girl's favorite Grimm fairy tale.

7.title: Got My Eye on You
7.plot: Heather takes hyperrealism to a whole new level by literally giving her client a super detailed third eyeball on the back of his head. Jeff reunites with one of the first clients he ever tattooed and gives him some "delicious" ink to pay tribute to his favorite movie, Pulp Fiction. Then John F. Kennedy comes back to life as a cyborg with the help of Chris Jones, and Chris 51 gets enchanted with a Gilbert and Sullivan inspired piece.

8.title: Blood, Guts and Donuts
8.plot: The Area 51 crew heads on a field trip to the world famous Voodoo Donuts where Heather dares Chris 51 to let her tattoo a donut on his belly. Meanwhile Chris 51 has his work cut out for him when a Star Trek super fan arrives at the shop in full costume paying homage to her favorite show, Josh tattoos a karaoke devotee with a "karaoke monster" and Chris Jones inks a bloody skull so real it will give you nightmares.

9.title: Take Me Out to the Ballgame
9.plot: Chris 51 and his crew attack a round of tattoos including Gremlins, wolves, dragons and time travel devices. Jeff designs an original pair of tattoos for a mother and daughter who love going on adventures together. Chris Jones inks a local baseball mascot on a diehard fan while revealing that he doesn't exactly know much about America's past time. So the group decides to take Jones to his very first baseball game to try and change his mind!

10.title: Welcome to the Tattoo Jungle
10.plot: It's a zoo of a time at Area 51 this week! First, Chris Jones brings a were-woman to life while Josh tattoos a new perspective on the classic tale, Peter Pan. Then Heather reunites with an old friend and gets the chance to finally redeem herself by covering up one of the first tattoos she ever did with a jungle themed homage to family! And later on, Chris 51 turns one woman's leg into an enchanted forest and resident science wizard, Jeff, transports a tiger into outer space.

locations: Area 51 Tattoo - 700 Q St., Springfield, Oregon, USA
imdb.title: Epic Ink
plot: A group of talented tattoo artists and their love of tattooing pop culture at their Oregon-based shop, Area 51 Tattoo.
